title: Bought a skin just before a sale
body: I don't know if anything can be done, but i bought death blossom Kha'Zix just two days before he went on sale. Is there anyways i could get some of the RP back? I think it was like only 200 or something.

replies.body: Indeed, as Zombiemaster suggested, we aren't currently providing price differences for sales that are announced early.  I highly recommend bookmarking our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date on upcoming sales or bundles.  Hopefully, that will help give you an edge!

I'm sorry, but refunds are not offered in situations like this due to the skins going on sale being [announced](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/september-sales-schedule-0) ahead of time.

It would be cool if when you were getting ready to purchase a skin you would get a dialog box saying "are you sure? this skin will be on sale in..." I purchased the skin not knowing it would go on sale, it would be really bothersome having to check the skin sale page whenever i want to buy something.
